item.title: Implementing Dictionary using a Trie
item.description: Implementation of Tries in C++ From Wikipedia: In computer science, a Trie is a type of search tree used to represent the retrieval of data (thus the name Trie). It’s an ordered data structure that is based on the prefix of a string. Thus, basically, a trie is a search tree that contains the information about a particular string. However, a trie can contain information also about the prefix and suffix informations on the string.
